title: FileSystemFilter should forward all interface functions to wrapped IOSystem instance
body:
I'm trying to override the [`IOSystem::PushDirectory`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L190), [`IOSystem::CurrentDirectory`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L197), [`IOSystem::StackSize`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L203) and [`IOSystem::PopDirectory`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L210) functions. Sadly my overloads are never called.

The problem seems to be, that the [`BaseImporter::ReadFile`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/code/BaseImporter.cpp#L80) function [wraps](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/code/BaseImporter.cpp#L89) my `IOSystem` instance inside a `FileSystemFilter` and the `FileSystemFilter` doesn't forward the above mentioned functions to my `IOSystem` instance. Therefore just the default implementations will be called.

Other virtual `IOSystem` functions ([`IOSystem::CreateDirectory`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L218), [`IOSystem::ChangeDirectory`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L225) and [`IOSystem::DeleteFile`](https://github.com/assimp/assimp/blob/v4.1.0/include/assimp/IOSystem.hpp#L227)) probably also can't be overridden.
